Text.Page:
Welcome! Finally!
Hope you know how important this expedition is.

According to the informant,
the Floating Stone is hidden deep inside the cave.
I know it won’t be easy, but I believe you’re more than capable of pulling this off.

The path ahead is the Guwangi Village Landing.
To get to the cave, you have to choose and travel through one of the three paths.

Once you defeat the Nightmare Berserk Arachnaea ahead,
a Path Selection Manacache will appear!

Good luck!
